item.title: Binda add a quote by Galway Kinnell
item.description:
"We’re all seeking that special person who is right for us. But if you’ve been through enough relationships, you begin to suspect there’s no right person, just different flavors of wrong. Why is this? Because you yourself are wrong in some way, and you seek out partners who are wrong in some complementary way. But it takes a lot of living to grow fully into your own wrongness. And it isn’t until you finally run up against your deepest demons, your unsolvable problems—the ones that make you truly who you are—that we’re ready to find a lifelong mate. Only then do you finally know what you’re looking for. You’re looking for the wrong person. But not just any wrong person: the right wrong person—someone you lovingly gaze upon and think, “This is the problem I want to have.”
I will find that special person who is wrong for me in just the right way.
Let our scars fall in love." -- Galway Kinnell

item.title: Binda add a quote by Galway Kinnell
item.description: "The first step ... shall be to lose the way." -- Galway Kinnell

item.title: Binda add a quote by Galway Kinnell
item.description: "Sometimes it is necessary To reteach a thing its loveliness" -- Galway Kinnell

item.title: Binda add a quote by Galway Kinnell
item.description: "There are two versions to every poem – the crying version and the straight version" -- Galway Kinnell

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The truth is rarely pure and never simple." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The books that the world calls immoral are books that show the world its own shame." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I don't want to go to heaven. None of my friends are there." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Women are meant to be loved, not to be understood." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am not young enough to know everything." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You will always be fond of me. I represent to you all the sins you never had the courage to commit." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The very essence of romance is uncertainty." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "With freedom, books, flowers, and the moon, who could not be happy?" -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "If you want to tell people the truth, make them laugh, otherwise they'll kill you." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I have nothing to declare except my genius." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The only way to get rid of temptation is to yield to it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Binda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance." -- Oscar Wilde
